NITIRAJ.NS.summary: Nitiraj Engineers Limited manufactures and sells a range of electronic weighing scales and systems, currency counting machines, and electronic fare meters for industrial and domestic consumption. It offers jewelry, tabletop, price computing, piece counting, platform, hanging, industrial weighing, baby weighing, person weighing, mother and child weighing, adult weighing, body mass index, and kitchen scales; and special application indicators, currency counting machines, taxi and rickshaw fare meters, and home and hotel automation products, as well as accessories. The company supplies its products under the Phoenix brand name through a network of dealers to customers in India and internationally. Nitiraj Engineers Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Dhule, India.
